full_summary:
**Commercial Electrical Services Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS4046199598-Doc4148248202
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4046199598
* **Publication Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 20, 2023, 2:00pm EDT

### Contract Details

* **Contract Start Date**: September 22, 2023
* **Contract End Date**: September 22, 2027

### Scope of Work

The Department of National Defence and the Canadian Armed Forces is seeking a standing offer for commercial electrical services.

### Requirements

* **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Operation**: Medicine Hat

### Notice of Amendment

This tender cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc4046569975, dated June 15th, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.

**Notice of Amendment: Closing Time**

Please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 20, 2023, at 2:00pm EDT. Any bid submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact and Submission Information

For more information, please contact:

Alibhay Premjee, Shan (SPAC/PSPC) (he/him)
E-mail: [shan.alibhaypremjee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shan.alibhaypremjee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Online Resources

* **Tender Notice**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17325077?extsite=MTczMjUwNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17325077?extsite=MTczMjUwNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) [French Version](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17325077?extsite=MTczMjUwNzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: All
